favourite.article: Praise the Lord that we have the prophetic word! This word is a lamp that shines in this dark age.
Thank You Lord, for Thy wonderful Word, that shines in the dark place. Thanks for Your prophetic Word made more firm in our hearts, which is grace for us.

# Tenemos la Palabra profética – 2 Pedro 1:19 La palabra profética tenemos A la cual debemos estar atentos Como a una lámpara que en lo oscuro Alumbra hasta que amanezca //Y la estrella De la mañana nazca En nuestro corazón//
Until the day dawns, and the morning star rises in your hearts! Amen.
In the Word as a realm of light, the prophetic word is a lamp shining in a dark place, until the day dawns and the morning star rises in our hearts.
We have the prophetic word! Praise You Lord, for becoming the edible Word for us to eat and enjoy! :)
Amen! And we have the prophetic word.. Made more firm, to which you do well..
And we have the prophetic word.
I love this. Every day I listen to this song.
Let us give heed to the prophetic word, which is made more firm! This verse is so enjoyable to sing.
Lord Jesus, thank You for the prophetic Word which shines in a dark place. Teach us to treasure up Your Word in our hearts. Amen.
